oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn
Class OsnObjectPublisherFactory

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.OsnObjectPublisherFactory

public final class OsnObjectPublisherFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory pattern used to separate the standard OA functionality and Oracle Social Network API implementation. Use the static methods in this class to for all creation of OSN related objects.

Since:
11.1.1.7.0
Version:
$Header: atgpf/applcore/applications/Common/Model/src/oracle/apps/fnd/applcore/oaext/osn/OsnObjectPublisherFactory.java /st_atgpf_11.1.1.7.2/3 2013/08/01 15:16:49 pacross Exp $

getOsnEndpoint

public static java.lang.String getOsnEndpoint()
Get the endpoint from topology manager for OSN.

Returns:
the endpoint location for OSN.

createOsnAdapter

public static OsnObjectAdapter createOsnAdapter(oracle.jbo.ViewObject osnVo,
                                                oracle.jbo.server.ViewRowImpl osnRow,
                                                byte osnAction,
                                                java.lang.String[] osnAttributes)
Create an OSN object adapter which will harvest the VO and Row to get the payload that will be sent to Oracle Social Network.

Parameters:
osnVo - the View Object containing the row to send to OSN.
osnRow - the row to send to OSN.
osnAction - insert/update/delete action.
osnAttributes - the names of the fields to send to OSN.
Returns:
the OSN object adaptor for the row shown.

getSocialDefinitionId

public static java.lang.String getSocialDefinitionId(oracle.jbo.ViewObject osnVo)
Determines the Social Definition Id for the VO passed in.

Parameters:
osnVo - the View Object containing the row to send to OSN.
Returns:
the OSN object adaptor for the row shown.

getPublishInstance

public static OsnObjectPublisher getPublishInstance()
Get an instance of a publisher that can send a Social Object to Oracle Social Network.

Returns:
a publisher instance.
